issue.title: [Rust] Provide example of Flight server for DataFusion
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7684](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7684). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Now that IPC is in place and we have the Flight crate, it should be possible to build a working Flight server in Rust and call it from other languages such as Java.

This PR is for creating a DataFusion example that creates a Flight server capable of running SQL queries.
